elements.label: Whispers Between Salesmen
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 1</color></size>

An echo of a reputation, distorted through the tunnels and dampened by the canals.

elements.label: The Talk of the Bazaar
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 2</color></size>

I am now an unlikely story. Unfortunately, those spread quickly among merchants.

elements.label: Unwelcome Guest
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 3</color></size>

The Flock is watching out for me. Eyes will be everywhere. beaklike blades will follow.

elements.label: Persona Non-grata
elements.description:
<size=120%><color=#201d59>Reputation Level 4</color></size>

The Nest has been sealed. I will not be getting in today.
